version_description:
1. Moved Light Schedules, Scenes, and Wake Up routines into a new Routines tab, to give easy access to all routines in one place.
2. Added support to add or delete Light Schedules and Wake Up routines.
3. Light Schedules now support color settings.
4. Added new Sleep routine, to simulate sunset and dim down gradually to help you fall asleep. (For Wi-Fi bulb, need upgrade firmware to latest version.)
5. Fixed known issues.

1.Fixed known issues.
2.Improved the user experience
3.Support sengled Wi-Fi bulbs and ZigBee smart plugs
4.Add “all on” and “all off” buttons on home page and light control page.
5. Support hub Z02

Optimized the process of networking configuration of hub.
This will solve a lot of problems when customer use 5G router, router with same SSID for 2.4G and 5G, Mesh router like Google Wi-Fi.

1. New user interface.
2.Enhanced the multi-bulb pairing procedure.  
3.Fixed a bug around occasional re-login requests.
4.Fixed a rarely occurring bug around bulb control challenges caused by IOT relink.
5.Fixed other known bugs.

Fixed the problem of bulb control failure caused by IOT reconnection mechanism defect.
Optimized the room style at the home page.
Updated some features related to GDPR regulations.
Fixed the bug which would probably cause log out.
Fixed hub setup failure issues which occasionally happened at few android 8.1+ mobile phone.

1.Added multiple languages support, including German and French.
2.Enhanced UI, enabling improved room/scene control. Increase functionality in Settings.
3.Improved set-up process, particularly to ease set-up in poor network conditions.
4.Fixed prior limitations for Wi-Fi password and room/device names.
5.Improved device status update issues.
6.Fixed other known bugs.

1.Added multiple languages support, including German and French.
2.Enhanced UI, enabling improved room/scene control. Increase functionality in Settings.
3.Improved set-up process, particularly to ease set-up in poor network conditions.
4.Fixed prior limitations for Wi-Fi password and room/device names.
5.Improved device status update issues.
6.Fixed other known bugs.

Added the ability to rearrange rooms on the dashboard
Moved Light Schedule settings to the bottom of the room pages
Fixed asynchronous issues between app and third-party color control commands.
Fixed an issue where upon keyboard input, the screen would turn black.
Fixed other known issues.
Optimized Element hub installation process.

1.Added custom scene support so that users can create their own light scenes.
2.Optimized Wi-Fi bulb installation process.
3.Fixed other known issues.

1.Redesigned and optimized the network set up process of Wi-Fi Bulb.
2.Added the support for more models of Sengled element bulbs.
3.Added the support for iPad.
4.Support Spanish.
5.Fixed known issues.

1. Added widget feature for custom scene. More convenient to control devices without opening Sengled Home app.
2. Fixed other known issues.

1. Added widget feature for custom scene. More convenient to control devices without opening Sengled Home app.
2. Fixed other known issues.

1.Supports Japanese and Italian.
2.Supports the Sengled Window & Door sensor and additional Sengled Smart Wi-Fi LED bulbs.
3.Fixed known issues.

1. Added support for Smart Switch (new product).
2. Improved product categorization for easier setup.
3. Updated in-app product names to match Sengled’s new naming.
4. Improved user experience, added troubleshooting guides.
5. Added Sengled Home App tips and voice control guides for new users.
6. Fixed other known issues.

1. Moved Light Schedules, Scenes, and Wake Up routines into a new Routines tab, to give easy access to all routines in one place.
2. Added support to add or delete Light Schedules and Wake Up routines.
3. Light Schedules now support color settings.
4. Added new Sleep routine, to simulate sunset and dim down gradually to help you fall asleep. (For Wi-Fi bulb, need upgrade firmware to latest version.)
5. Fixed known issues.
Fixed Smart Wi-Fi LED setup issues on iOS 13.

1. Added HomeKit support for smart hub based products. (New Sengled smart hub that supports HomeKit is coming soon.)
2. Improved Zigbee bulbs setup process.
3. Fixed known issues.

1. Improved Wi-Fi bulbs setup process.
2. Fixed known issues.
Fixed known issues.

1. Support Alexa account to account link feature.
2. Add a variety of light effects of color bulbs.
3. Fixed the known issues.
Fixed known issue
Fixed known issues.
Fixed known issues.
We’ve enhanced the security level for the Sengled Home App.

1. Simplified the setup process of Wi-Fi devices.
2. Added support for more Wi-Fi device models.
3. Fixed and optimized the code scan setup process.
4. Fixed other known issues.

1. Added sengled smart switch color control supports.
2. Improved APP security level, reduced security risks.
3. Fixed other known issues.
Fixed known issues.
Fixed the known issues.

1. Improved App loading speed.
2. Fixed known issues.

1. Simplified the setup process of Zigbee devices.
2. Fixed other known issues.

The latest 2.0 version of Sengled Home includes several changes and improvements, providing a better user experience.
1. We've merged some of the pages and have a new and improved layout.
2. We moved the Room Information Settings to each Room page.
3. We have optimized single light Control pages to show brightness, color temperature, color, and dynamic effects separately. The controller has been enlarged for better precision.
4. Custom Scene have been moved to the Menu bar for a cleaner space.
Fixed known issues.

1. In the room and light control pages, sliding left or right could able to switch functions between brightness, color temperature，color and light effects, making it more convenient for one-handed operation.
2. We support Google Deep Link and Google App Flip now. Try it and have fun!
3. Fixed known issues.
Fixed known issues.
Improve the loading speed of Home page and fixed some known issues.

1. Optimizes the user registration process. A verification code is no longer needed to verify the account.
2. If the user fails to receive the verification email, they can follow app prompts and send an email to the Sengled cloud to complete the account verification.
3. Supports new models of smart devices.
4. Fixes known issues.
